medical_history.chief_complaint: Dizziness for 6 months and a history of syncope 1 year ago.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with dizziness for 6 months. Syncope occurred 1 year ago. The severity and any aggravating or relieving factors are not specified.
